Summary: going to work, looked up and saw a triangle craft overhead very low
divs: Sighting Detailsgoing to work on thrid shift, setup in car and looked out of the windshild upward to see the sky. There was a triangle craft directly over head with three lights, one on each corner and a red revolving light in the center. The craft banked to the right and flew toward Jackson,Tn. The lights were very bright and seamed to be tall or thick, The craft was very low and big,I placed my fist up to the object to block in out to get a approxmate size. Craft flew off toward jackson.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around December 30th 2008
